DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Single Injection SCH 900962 Versus Daily recFSH Injections Women Undergoing Controlled Ovarian Stimulation ( Study P06029 )
DOC.criteria: Willing able provide write informed consent trial P06029 well FrozenThawed Embryo Transfer ( FTET ) followup trial P06031 , pharmacogenetic analysis ( applicable ) . Female > =35 < =42 year age indication COS IVF/ICSI . Body weight ≥50.0 kg , body mass index ( BMI ) > =18.0 < =32.0 kg/m2 . Regular spontaneous menstrual cycle variation outside 2435 day . Ejaculatory sperm must available ( donate and/or cryopreserved sperm allow ) . Results clinical laboratory test , cervical smear , physical examination within normal limit clinically acceptable investigator . Adhere trial schedule . A recent history of/or current endocrine abnormality . A history ovarian hyperresponse ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) . A history of/or current polycystic ovary syndrome . More 20 basal antral follicle < 11 mm ( ovary combine ) early follicular phase . Less 2 ovary ovarian abnormality . Unilateral bilateral hydrosalpinx . Intrauterine fibroid ≥5 cm clinically relevant pathology , could impair embryo implantation pregnancy continuation . More three unsuccessful COS cycle IVF/ICSI since last establish ongoing pregnancy ( applicable ) . A history non low ovarian response FSH/human menopausal gonadotropin ( hMG ) treatment . A history recurrent miscarriage . FSH > 15.0 IU/L luteinizing hormone ( LH ) > 12.0 IU/L early follicular phase . Positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) Hepatitis B. Contraindications use gonadotropin gonadotropin release hormone ( GnRH ) antagonists . A recent history of/or current epilepsy , thrombophilia , diabetes , cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal pulmonary autoimmune disease require regular treatment . Smoking recently stop smoking ( ie , within last 3 month prior sign informed consent ) . A recent history presence alcohol drug abuse . The participant sperm donor know gene defect , genetic abnormality , abnormal karyotyping , relevant current indication health offspring . Prior concomitant medication disallow protocol .
